episodes.title: Playing Tight
episodes.plot: Vic sets out to stop stolen military weapons from fueling a gang war, unaware that it threatens to expose him as the mastermind behind the theft of the Armenian mob's laundered money.

episodes.title: Blood and Water
episodes.plot: Vic promises a gang lieutenant the top job if he agrees to set up his boss; Dutch and Claudette's investigation into a gang shooting points to an unexpected triggerman.

episodes.title: Bottom Bitch
episodes.plot: A hooker wants to Vic to punish her former pimp, Dutch arrests a sex offender in an elderly woman's rape.

episodes.title: Streaks and Tips
episodes.plot: The rivalry between the Strike Team and the Decoy Squad heats up as they compete to find a murder suspect.

episodes.title: Mum
episodes.plot: As Dutch and Claudette continue to pursue a rapist who is targeting elderly women, the arrest of a local gang member threatens to expose the Strike Team's involvement in the money train heist.

episodes.title: Posse Up
episodes.plot: Officer Tommy Hisk becomes a prime suspect in the murder of his ex-wife and son.

episodes.title: Safe
episodes.plot: As missing persons investigation uncovers a graveyard for illegal immigrants working in an illicit drug lab.

episodes.title: Cracking Ice
episodes.plot: Vic is enlisted to help save his rivals on the Decoy team from having their undercover operation exposed.

episodes.title: Slipknot
episodes.plot: A lynching threatens to ignite a race war between Farmington's black and Latino gangs.

episodes.title: What Power Is...
episodes.plot: Captain Aceveda turns up the heat in his search for the gangster who sexually assaulted him.

episodes.title: Strays
episodes.plot: As Dutch tries to understand "The Cuddler" rapist, Vic enlists Danny for an important undercover assignment.

episodes.title: Riceburner
episodes.plot: The pursuit of a gang hitman pits the tight-lipped Korean community against the police.

episodes.title: Fire in the Hole
episodes.plot: As Vic tries to sidetrack the money train investigation, Claudette goes undercover to crack a child porn ring.

episodes.title: All In
episodes.plot: As the Strike Team is threatened with exposure in the money train heist, Claudette goes it alone in order to find evidence of a public defender's drug addiction.

episodes.title: On Tilt
episodes.plot: As Vic goes after Margos, Claudette risks her career to see that an innocent man is freed from prison.
